next_state: -= Kitchen =- You find yourself in a kitchen. An usual one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You can see a fridge, so there's that. The fridge contains a roasted pork chop, a red onion, a block of cheese and a yellow onion, so there's that. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see an oven. You scan the room, seeing a table. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The table is massive. On the table you can see a cookbook and a knife. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing. You can make out a counter. You shudder, but continue examining the counter. On the counter you make out a tomato and a banana. You can make out a stove. The stove is conventional. But there isn't a thing on it. There is an open plain door leading south. You need an exit without a door? You should try going east. > -= Kitchen =-0/3
